data.title: Silvia Ruffini
data.meta_description: Silvia Ruffini was an Italian noble woman and mistress of Cardinal Alessandro Farnese before he became pope ; she was the mother of his four children.
data.text: Silvia Ruffini (1475 â€“ 6 December 1561 in Rome) was an Italian noble woman and mistress of Cardinal Alessandro Farnese before he became pope (Pope Paul III from 1534); she was the mother of his four children.
